content: bocados spanish for little bites celebrate the fun of colorwork knitting - by coming in 25g skeins of alegria grande they re perfect for adding a splash of color to projects --------- a quick-to-knit hat explores color mixing - choose from 2- 3- or 4-color versions \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\ size adult medium to fit 20-22 head circumference hat is very stretchy materials manos del uruguay alegria grande 75% superwash merino 25% polyamide approx 100g/197 yds 1 skip mc manos del uruguay alegria grande bocados 75% superwash merino 25% polyamide approx 25g/49 yds 1 2 or 3 in ccs *2-color version* shown in ag9995 agave mc with agb2363 tahiti cc *3-color version* ag2121 cinnamon mc with agb2102 juanita cc1 and agb2540 kohl cc2 *4-color version* ag5000 cincuenta mc with agb2600 magenta cc1 agb2058 turmeric cc2 and agb2394 teal cc3 us 10/6mm needle 16 circular and dpn or size to obtain gauge stitch marker gauge 16 sts = 4 with two strands of yarn held together over 1x1 rib relaxed 10 sts = 4 over 1x1 rib comfortably stretched note yarn is held doubled throughout
